title: Love's Eternal Embrace
description: An Irish medieval town is haunted by a vampire who requires ahuman sacrifice every six months. When the town's elders find that Liam, a former Knight's Templar, has survived his encounter with the vampire, they forge a new plan. They want Liam to allow the vampire to feed offof him so as to spare their townsfolk. Liam must make a embracethe task or end the vampire's life.A knight...A lady...And a deadly dark secret...A fiend dwells in the forest and Sir Liam Cantwell sets out to slay it. Only the fiend is a fair maiden named Glamis Drui. Will Liam fall prey to her deadly embrace or will his knightly charms be her undoing?
author: Karen Michelle Nutt
